QuestData.Title: War Dance
QuestData.Description: Some see our people as gentle giants, or noble savages. They have never seen us fight against our own kind...against betrayers from within.$B$BThe Grimtotem were offered mercy in exile, and they have scarred their own home to spite us. They will no longer be tolerated in Mulgore.$B$BI've already sent our warriors ahead to drive them out through Stonetalon Pass, to the north. You have fought bravely against the Grimtotem, $n; I ask that you join the battle again. Go, and help deal this final blow.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Orno Grimtotem at Stonetalon Pass.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome back, $n.$B$B<Baine stares off a moment, centering himself.>$B$BWhat was done was not for revenge, or pride. It was simply to protect Thunder Bluff, and all our people, from torment and fear. Today, Mulgore is safe once more.$B$BThe Earth Mother thanks you for all your brave deeds, $n, as do I. You have earned your reward, hero. May you be welcome in Thunder Bluff always.
